trans-unit.source: Describes the interior of a graphics shape composed of rectangles and paths.
This class cannot be inherited.
A region is scalable because its coordinates are specified in world coordinates.
On a drawing surface, however, its interior is dependent on the size and shape of the pixels representing it.
An application can use regions to clip the output of drawing operations.
These regions are called clipping regions.
For more information on using regions for clipping, see [How to: Use Clipping with a Region](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-clipping-with-a-region.md).
An application can also use regions in hit-testing operations, such as checking whether a point or a rectangle intersects a region.
For more information on using regions for hit-testing, see [How to: Use Hit Testing with a Region](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-hit-testing-with-a-region.md).
An application can fill a region by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRegion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
This constructor initializes a new <xref:System.Drawing.Region> with an infinite interior.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
This method creates a new <xref:System.Drawing.Region> with a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.
The new region is defined as the interior of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> specified by the `path` parameter.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> that defines the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
path is `null`.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> from the specified data.
This method creates a new <xref:System.Drawing.Region> with an interior defined by an existing <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.
The `rgnData` parameter is an array that contains the definition of an existing <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData"></xref> that defines the interior of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
rgnData is `null`.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
This method creates a new <xref:System.Drawing.Region> with a rectangular interior.
The interior is defined by the `rect` parameter.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that defines the interior of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.
This method creates a new <xref:System.Drawing.Region> with a rectangular interior.
The interior is defined by the `rect` parameter.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that defines the interior of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> that this method creates.

Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to contain the portion of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> that does not intersect with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> object to complement this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> object.
region is `null`.

Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to contain the portion of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that does not intersect with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure to complement this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.

Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to contain the portion of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> that does not intersect with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> to complement this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
path is `null`.

Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to contain the portion of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure that does not intersect with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure to complement this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
Calling <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A> allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Region> to be reallocated for other purposes.
Call <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> in an unusable state.

After calling <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> was occupying.

For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
Always call <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.
Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> object's `Finalize` method.
Tests whether the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> is identical to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> on the specified drawing surface.
The current transformation of the graphics context `g` is used to compute the region interiors on the drawing surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to test.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a drawing surface.
`true` if the interior of region is identical to the interior of this region when the transformation associated with the g parameter is applied; otherwise, `false`.
g or region is `null`.
Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to contain only the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to exclude from this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
region is `null`.

Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to contain only the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> to exclude from this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
path is `null`.
Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to contain only the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure to exclude from this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.

Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to contain only the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure to exclude from this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> from a handle to the specified existing [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] region.
This method creates a new <xref:System.Drawing.Region> with an interior defined by the existing <xref:System.Drawing.Region> referred to by the handle in the `hrgn` parameter.
A handle to an existing <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
The new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.

Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents a rectangle that bounds this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> on the drawing surface of a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
The current transformation of the graphics context is used to compute the region interior on the drawing surface.
The bounding rectangle is not always the smallest possible bounding rectangle depending on the current transformation.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> is drawn.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents the bounding rectangle for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> on the specified drawing surface.
g is `null`.
Returns a Windows handle to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> in the specified graphics context.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> is drawn.
A Windows handle to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
g is `null`.
Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData"></xref> that represents the information that describes this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Region> class allows you to define a custom shape.
The shape can be made up of lines, polygons, and curves.
<xref:System.Drawing.Region.GetRegionData%2A> describes the shape contained in this <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData"></xref> that represents the information that describes this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
Returns an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structures that approximate this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> after the specified matrix transformation is applied.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that represents a geometric transformation to apply to the region.
An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structures that approximate this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> after the specified matrix transformation is applied.
matrix is `null`.
Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to the intersection of itself with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> to intersect with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to the intersection of itself with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure to intersect with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to the intersection of itself with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure to intersect with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to the intersection of itself with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to intersect with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
Tests whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> has an empty interior on the specified drawing surface.
The current transformation of the graphics context `g` is used to compute the region interior on the drawing surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a drawing surface.
`true` if the interior of this is empty when the transformation associated with g is applied; otherwise, `false`.
g is `null`.
Tests whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> has an infinite interior on the specified drawing surface.
The current transformation of the graphics context `g` is used to compute the region interior on the drawing surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a drawing surface.
`true` if the interior of this is infinite when the transformation associated with g is applied; otherwise, `false`.
g is `null`.
Tests whether any portion of the specified rectangle is contained within this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> when drawn using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
The current transformation of the graphics context is used to compute the region interior and the rectangle coordinates on the drawing surface.
The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to test.
The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to test.
The width of the rectangle to test.
The height of the rectangle to test.

`true` when any portion of the specified rectangle is contained within this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Tests whether any portion of the specified rectangle is contained within this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> when drawn using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
The current transformation of the graphics context is used to compute the region interior and the rectangle coordinates on the drawing surface.

`true` when any portion of the specified rectangle is contained within this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.

`true` when the specified point is contained within this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.

The x-coordinate of the point to test.
The y-coordinate of the point to test.
`true` when the specified point is contained within this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Tests whether the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure is contained within this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structure to test.
`true` when point is contained within this ; otherwise, `false`.

Tests whether any portion of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure is contained within this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> when drawn using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
The current transformation of the graphics context is used to compute the region interior and the rectangle coordinates on the drawing surface.

`true` when any portion of the rect is contained within this ; otherwise, `false`.

The current transformation of the graphics context is used to compute the region interior and the point coordinates on the drawing surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structure to test.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a graphics context.
`true` when point is contained within this ; otherwise, `false`.
